bullets: Policy coverage focused on regulation, taxation, and sector-specific enforcement.
Election-cycle messaging affected perceived policy uncertainty.
Trade and industrial policy headlines shaped manufacturing narratives.
Budget negotiations influenced expectations on spending priorities.
Antitrust and platform regulation remained a frequent theme.
insights: Markets often react to policy uncertainty through sector rotation rather than broad moves.
Regulatory headlines can be short-lived; sustained themes show up over weeks.

clusters.title: Regulation and enforcement
clusters.summary: Stories tracked regulatory signals across tech, finance, and energy sectors.

clusters.title: Fiscal policy and spending
clusters.summary: Coverage discussed budget priorities and impacts on contractors and infrastructure names.

disclaimer: Educational use only. Not financial advice.
